name: racecards
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool horse_racing_usa.
Tool description: Horse Racing API - USA races
API description: Fetches the list of races for a given date from the Greyhound Racing UK API.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the racecards in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Defaults to '2021-06-05' if not provided.
